greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Let k = A239161(n); then a(n) = (sum of divisors of k) /(sum of divisors d of k with d <= sqrt(k)).
comment: A000203(k)/A066839(k) is an integer, where k = A239161(n).
link: Michel Lagneau, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = { for(n = 1, nn, q = sigma(n) / sumdiv(n, d, d*(d<=sqrt(n))); if (type(q) == "t_INT", print1(q, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 05 2014
results.author: _Michel Lagneau_, Feb 27 2014
